extendedInfo.description: Special note about donations:So far you guys have put up $46.90 in donations!  The server costs for this year have been $37.20, so it's pretty close to exact.  I posted this earlier but it got removed at some point:  any excess in donations beyond server costs gets donated to http://scholarshipamerica.org/, so don't worry about going over :)Email: joe.daverin@gmail.comWeb page: http://daverin.com/bracket/index.htmlFacebook: http://www.facebook.com/BracketAndroidGoogle+: https://plus.google.com/b/114304345541588971949/ (pretty, right?)End special noteThis is a Bracket tracker for the March Madness tournament, including easy editing and score tracking and live updates.There's no instructions in the app, the phone screens are crowded enough as it is, so I'll give a short set of instructions here:Drag your finger around to move between the parts of the bracket, the final four is in the center.  To select a team tap the game you want to pick (light tap, not a hold) and the list of teams will come up.  Then tap the team you want and it will be selected.As scores come in they'll be updated, and your picks will turn green if right, red if wrong (also, future games that can no longer be won will turn red).Hold your finger on a bracket in the list to rename or delete it.

reviews.title: Great app, easy to follow
reviews.comment: Well done man, this app is awesome
reviews.author: Eric Vasquez

reviews.title: Great app except...
reviews.comment: Accurate updating easy to use and helpful but it keeps deleting my brackets.. please fix and you\'ll get 5 stars
reviews.author: david coyle

reviews.title: Luv it!
reviews.comment: Nice app! I can actually read it....ESPN\'s app font was way too small for me even while using my reading glasses I still needed a magnifying glass! LOL.  Only problem - I have a very hard time getting to the middle final four. I don\'t know if I over-swipe my finger or what but I get there eventually it just seems like it takes 10 or 11 swipes! Thank you for a great app!
reviews.author: Allyson D

reviews.title: Solid A
reviews.comment: I like the show updates for games in progress. Great app, thanks!
reviews.author: Valerie Montague

reviews.title: Amazing App
reviews.comment: This app is amazing. I likeit because you can do anything with it. You have to try it out first though. To understand it.

reviews.title: Easy for a non sports fan.
reviews.comment: I am not usually into watching sports & tracking results with my husband, but this app pulled me in & was easy for me to follow.

reviews.title: this app
reviews.comment: this app is on, point with everything.i usually don\'t comment on anything i buy, but this is a legit app. i did donate to the creator and i hope it comes back for 2014 ncaa tourney....

reviews.comment: A little tweakin and this is the best. Auto-update? Full bracket screen option for navigation? Final 5 minute game notification?
reviews.author: Robert Woodruff

reviews.title: Excellent job, thank you!
reviews.comment: You are the man!  Excellent app that does exactly as promised, thank you for your time and expertise.  Now if only the University of Memphis Tigers would play as well as you code we would win it all, but looks like Michigan State will destroy us because the Tigers refuse to play as a team.
reviews.author: Leonard Baker

reviews.title: Solid
reviews.comment: It would be REALLY cool to get some in depth info. Ex. Records, match up history, game stats.   But that would be a lot.  Its a great app!
